price: 13. Waxayna qaadi culaysyadooda4, iyo culaysyo kale oo la jira culaysyadooda,  waxaana la weydiin  Maalinta Qiyaamaha waxay been abuuran jireen.
arabic: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
footnotes: 4. Waxay qaadi doonaan denbiyadooda, ay u dheer yihiin denbiyada dadka ay lumiyeen, iyagoo kuwaasi dambe aan iyagana denbiga sidaa uusan kaga dhaceyn oo lagaga naaqusineyn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan maʿa athqālihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyāmati ʿammā kānū yaftarūna
translations: and surely they will be questioned
